queryCondition.queryText:
EmailEvents
| where Timestamp > ago(1h)
| where Subject contains "urgent"
| project Timestamp, RecipientEmailAddress, SenderFromAddress, Subject, ReportId

alertTemplate.title: Potential Phishing Email Detected v2
alertTemplate.description:
An email with characteristics commonly associated with phishing attempts 
was detected. The email contains urgent language and includes attachments 
or URLs that may be malicious.
